wikimedia-copyrightwarning:
As you dey save changes, you dey agree to de [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use Terms of Use], wey you sa dey irrevocably agree say you dey release your contribution under de [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_Creative_Commons_Attribution-ShareAlike_3.0_Unported_License CC BY-SA 3.0 License] den de [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL].
You dey agree say a hyperlink or URL is sufficient attribution under de Creative Commons license.
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked:
'''Your IP address [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|block for all wikis top]].'''

$1 ($2) wey block am.
Ein reason dem give be ''$3''.

* Block start: $4
* Block go expire: $5

Your IP address now nu be $6.
We beg attache all above details for de queries you make insyd.

If you believe say dem block you by mistake, you go fi find additional info den instructions for de [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] global policy insyd.
Otherwise, to discuss de block we beg [[m:Steward requests/Global|post request give review for Meta-Wiki top]].
wikimedia-globalblocking-ipblocked-xff:
'''One or chaw proxy servers use by your request be [[m:Special:MyLanguage/Global blocks|globally blocked]].'''

$1 ($2) wey block am.
Ein reason wey he give be ''$3''.

* De block start: $4
* De block go expire: $5

De blocked proxy address na e be $6.
We beg attache all details wey dey above for de queries you make inside.

If you believe say dem block you by mistake, you go fit find additional info den instructions for de [[m:Special:MyLanguage/No open proxies|No open proxies]] global policy insyd.
Otherwise, to discuss de block we beg [[m:Steward requests/Global|post request giv review for Meta-Wiki top]].
